summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingThis COSRX AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner is formulated with AHA, BHA, and purifying botanical ingredients. The AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner works to soothe, refresh and soften the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsA multi use gentle exfoliating toner for softer skinThis unique formulation of ingredients helps to improve skin texture, hydration, increases vitality while eliminating impurities all in one stepMinimal ingredients, maximum effectMade with 10% white willow bark and 10% of Apple Water which is a natural plant derived acid that relieves irritation while exfoliating the skinKey IngredientsSalix Alba (Willow) Bark Water + Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water : Offers gentle exfoliation & helps reduce breakouts and marks from spotsGlycolic Acid : Exfoliates the surface of the skin & smooths and softens skinBetaine Salicylate : Clears congested pores & balances oil productionFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesAlcoholItem 2504908How To UseAfter cleansing, spray the toner onto a cotton pad and gently wipe onto face, avoiding the eye and mouth area. For use during the daytime, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.Pro Tip: Apply toner to a dampened cotton pad and wipe over your skin for soft exfoliation, or soak cotton pads in toner and place them on dry, irritated skin to use as simple skin pack.IngredientsWater, Salix Alba (willow) Bark Water, Pyrus Malus (apple) Fruit Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-hexanediol, Sodium Lactate, Glycolic Acid, Betaine Salicylate, Allantoin, Panthenol, Ethyl Hexanediol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, spray the toner onto a cotton pad and gently wipe onto face, avoiding the eye and mouth area. For use during the daytime, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.Pro Tip: Apply toner to a dampened cotton pad and wipe over your skin for soft exfoliation, or soak cotton pads in toner and place them on dry, irritated skin to use as simple skin pack.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I like this product! It has a good smell and makes my skin looks nice. I use it as my first step after I wash my face every night and when I wake up my skin feels healty.

reviews.headline: My daughters love their new skincare routine
reviews.comments:
My daughters are loving their new skincare routine. They are happy with the results their new parducts are giving. 

I will buy this product for them again.

reviews.headline: So far so good!
reviews.comments: I'm fairly certain this was the product that saved my skin! Way less breakouts and clogged pores since using. I've had no bad reactions. Love it!!

reviews.headline: New staple for me.
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and an oily tzone. My breakout on my cheek and forehead bumps have reduced in size. The acids are low and balanced to where it doesn't dry me out and can use almost everyday. I like that it's sprayable and I don't have to touch my face.

reviews.headline: 2 for the price of 1!
reviews.comments: If youre looking for a lightweight, yet effective toner … Look no further. Within a week, i have seen a dramatic difference in the appearance of my skin. It tones and exfoliates at the same time! Granted, it does exfoliate, but it is gentle enough as well to be used everyday throughout the week. Dont walk to this product .. RUN!

reviews.headline: 4 months in review- made things worse for me
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this product. I randomly started getting some whiteheads that wouldnt go away (i have acne prone skin but whiteheads are not my norm), so i wanted to give this a try. I was really excited at first as it seemed to work overnight. The morning following the first use (and every use following) my skin immediately looked plumper and nice. But as the day and following days went on it went back to bumpy and seemed to get worse. I thought maybe skin was purging due to the product causing a faster cell turnover. After builing up the tolerance for it it did not help. I took a break and went back to simple skin care (cleanser and moisturizer) and skin cleared up. I decided to give it another try a couple months later to see if the same thing would happen and sure enough it made it worse for me again. Im not sure why it initially appears to work but is misleading. It sucks that products work differently for everyone but this was my experience.

reviews.headline: Fave
reviews.comments: Good for oily and acne prone skin.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I started using this toner 6 months ago and i love using the spray bottle and then applying it to my face. It's very gentle and keeps my skin looking hydrated

reviews.headline: An absolute staple.
reviews.comments: I have been using the product RELIGIOUSLY for  a year. i have acne prone, oily, sensitive skin and this is gentle enough to not irritate me but also works well to keep acne at bay. I wouldnt say it clears pores, but it most definitely keeps new blemishes from appearing. I used to get cystic acne on my jaw for years, i have had virtually no painful cystic acne since using this. Absoultely worth it.

reviews.headline: Great Toner Regardless of Price
reviews.comments: Ive been using this toner for a few months now it usually moisturizes my skin well enough that my skin has a nice glow but i use moisturizer (Corsx oil free moisturizer) for an extra layer of barrier protection. I dont like the fact that it's a spray because i run out so fast and waste a lot product that doesnt spray directly onto the toner pad. But despite that bad design it does a great job on my sensitive oily skin and leaves it hydrated.

reviews.headline: Korean Skincare is the move!
reviews.comments: I know everyone gets tired of hearing the influencers rave about certain things and then they don't end up working for us, but this is one of the products that they should have been raving about. If you're dealing with any type of textured skin, this will help with it if you want to see better Brighter results after using it whether it be daytime or nighttime, you should be using . Overall it's a great applicator because its a spray bottle and goes on without you having to lift a finger really.

reviews.headline: Love this!!
reviews.comments: this stuff is absolutely incredible. i got it in a tester kit by the brand and it's done wonders to clear my skin. i bought this during a breakout and it cleared up so much!!

reviews.headline: It Worked But Only to Some Extent?!
reviews.comments:
I really do believe this does something because my skin definitely went through a purge phase for the first month (so don't start this before an important picture time). But this was also my first time using an AHA/BHA.
A lot of the whiteheads turned into small pimples (different than my typical oily-skin hormonal acne). Thankfully after a full month my skin finally settled. The thing is, my skin still gets hormonal pimples, still has scars, and my pores are still visible. BUT, I'm not getting anymore tiny whitehead acne.

It's not a miracle worker, but I do think I'll keep this in my routine. Btw it DOES have a sting to it if you have broken skin, but it doesn't actually irritate my skin. It helps having a really good moisturizer (but when wouldn't it). After purchasing this I used it right after the shower (where I used the good morning gel cleanser), and right before my ultra repair moisturizing cream.

reviews.headline: made me breakout
reviews.comments: i tried this to help clear my clogged pores in my nose but it didnt help and caused acne along the rest of my face

reviews.headline: for my acne prone sensitive skin girlies
reviews.comments: i've been incorporating this product in my skin care routine morning & night for the past two-three weeks and the results have been showingggg!! i used to have little breakouts here and there along with a few acne scars but this has helped clear my skin

reviews.headline: Wow..in disbelief!
reviews.comments: I have suffered from moderate acne since I was 9. I cant even remember the last time my body looked clear. I always was able to control my face acne, but never my body. Every other product I have tried like Benzoyl peroxide, salicyic acid, etc, really never did much for my skin.. until i used this. I have only been using it daily for a week and the difference is unreal. It also has helped a ton with the redness spots previous acne has left behind. Definitrly recommend this to anyone who has suffered with stubborn body acne!!

reviews.headline: I can't use any other toner now
reviews.comments: I bought this on a whim and now I'm obsessed! I apply it with a cotton pad after cleansing and it just makes my skin feel incredibly clean. I just ran out and had to use a different brand and it was so bad, I'm buying more of this immediately.

reviews.headline: Great for body acne!
reviews.comments: I decided to try this out for chest, back, and arm breakouts after starting a hormone treatment and the results were almost instantaneous. The majority of my spots cleared up in less than a week. The spray actually makes it super easy to apply to the body without wasting product. I can see how it might be a problem for the face since you shouldn't spray it directly on your face, but for the body it's fantastic.

reviews.headline: Been using for over a year and never will stop
reviews.comments: Cleared up my bumps on my skin that i've had since i was 13, could not pay me enough to stop using it

reviews.headline: Didn't see a difference
reviews.comments: I used for about two months and didnt find that it did anything good for my skin. If anything it caused irritation and dryness which actually contributed to my breakouts

media.headline: Cleared my adult acne in less than a WEEK.
media.caption: Skin after only 4 days of use

media.headline: This will be a staple for life!

faceoff_positive.comments: My skin is dehydrated, but still acne prone at pushing 70. With an Asian/K approach, you need to balance the acid mantle at the first, toner step.  BHA gets deep in the pores and does that, with zero frills.  Not an American style alcohol based toner.  Though it will remove any cleansing residue, that is not the point. If you have, as K regimes call it, 'trouble' skin, you need bha in the first layer. Even for decent skin, it renders any of the following skincare steps more effective.  For me, this is a must-have, HG product.  If I leave it out, my skin clogs. It may not be enough bha for oily types...you may need another bha layer.  Cosrx has blackhead power essence for that.  Having no alcohol, it is not drying.  This is one of the top products I have found in ~50 years of skincare.  No frills.  If you like a straightforward, ingredients-driven approach, Cosrx is for you.  And it won't empty your wallet, either.  I'm out of this now, and my skin shows it!  When I follow a PC/ Cosrx routine, even the SAs say 'What acne?  You don't have acne!''  Most Cosrx products have a minimal ingredients list.  As with food, that is usually better for you.  If you use Cosdna to check ingredients, as I have to, you NEVER see warnings.  Products are very likely to be allergy/sensitivity friendly and unfragranced.  Just targeted ingredients that work.  Cosrx rules.  Thanks, Ulta, for starting 3 Cosrx products.  Need I say, go for more?
faceoff_positive.headline: Excellent low pH toner

faceoff_negative.comments:
I love several other toners and essences from CosRX so wanted to give a bottle of this a go as I do have sensitive acne and blemish prone skin.
This was unfortunately super drying for my skin, ironically as the most watery toner I've ever tried, and it did not suit my dry skin type at all - I normally use toners to hydrate my full body's skin before moisturizing, and this just left me so dry that even following with a moisturizer I love and trust was noticeably feeling a lot less soft and I felt dry again much quicker. I tried to make this work by trying every body moisturizer I had, but it just wasn't working. So I actually was ready to dump with out, but decided to mix this with another toner that doesn't have active ingredients in it so I could use it on my feet before putting vaseline over them in hopes my feet wouldn't suffer so much like my body's skin. I can't use this as a toner on my body like every toner I have used before, so it is definitely not suited to my skin's needs sadly.
I like enough products by this brand that I don't think I will stop using anything else I've enjoyed by them because of this, but as this is the 2nd product I do not enjoy by them, I will just be sticking to what I like rather than try to experiment with anything else now.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dried out skin more
